alert.note: Alert for Chesterfield; Kershaw; Lancaster (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 07 at 6:25PM EDT until August 07 at 7:30PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: The National Weather Service in Columbia has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Lancaster County in central South Carolina... Northwestern Chesterfield County in central South Carolina... Northern Kershaw County in central South Carolina... * Until 730 PM EDT. * At 625 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Matthews to Chester State Park, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to trees and powerlines. * Locations impacted include... Lancaster, Springdale, Pageland, Kershaw, Elgin, Heath Springs, Westville, USC Lancaster, Irwin, Liberty Hill, Andrew Jackson State Park, Van Wyck, Mt Pisgah, Buford, Jefferson, Ruby, Mount Croghan, Arrowood Estates, Bell Town Fire Station, and Faith Christian School. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
